summary: FEMA leads the federal response to weather and climate-related disasters. FEMA has also played a key role in the COVID-19 response, even as disasters have become more frequent. We testified that FEMA: Has staff shortages due in part to burnout Could better communicate about eligibility requirements for disaster programs Doesn't have data to determine whether there are social or institutional barriers to accessing disaster programs...
title: FEMA: Opportunities to Help Address Mission and Management Challenges
